document.full_text: david beckham will attend the royal wedding in london on friday, the jet off to rejoin his los angeles galaxy teammates for their m.l.s. match outside dallas on saturday.
document.title: soccer royalty and the royal wedding
lines_and_colors: david beckham will attend the royal wedding in london on friday, the jet off to rejoin his los angeles galaxy teammates for their m.l.s. match outside dallas on saturday.
